revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=BECOMING IMMORAL is MOVING DOWNWARDS ON THE PATH |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=СТАНОВИТЬСЯ БЕЗНРАВСТВЕННЫМ - ЭТО ДВИГАТЬСЯ ВНИЗ |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=(Inna) }} |Family=Метафоры Морали, Метафора структуры события |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=двигаться вниз по пути |Target frame=становиться безнравственным |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=MORALITY is UPRIGHTNESS }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Но я согласен, что в тех случаях, когда один из супругов опустился морально, пошел по наклонной и не считается ни с каким мнением, остается только один выход: развод |Example.Gloss=But i agree that in cases when one of the spouses went down morally,went downhill and doesn't care about any opinions left is only one way: divorce |Example.English translation=But I agree that if a husband or wife became immoral, went downhill doesn't care what others think of it, there is only one way out - divorce. |Example.Provenance=ruscorpora.ru }} |Entered by=Inna |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=ACTION - IS MOTION ALONG A PATH |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ДЕЙСТВИЕ - ЭТО ДВИЖЕНИЕ ПО ПУТИ }} |Family=Метафора структуры события (Event structure metaphor), |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Experiential basis=движение |Source frame=Движение_по_пути |Target frame=действие |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=aктер (actor) |Source=двигатель (mover) }}{{Mapping |Target=x-схема действий (action_x-schema) |Source=x-схема движения (motion_x-schema) }} |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a source subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=ДЕЙСТВИЕ - ЭТО ДВИЖЕНИЕ }} |Entailments={{Entailment |Entailment.Target entailment=помощь действий (aid to action) |Entailment.Source inference=помощь движения по пути (aid to motion along a path) |Entailment.Entailed metaphors=ПОМОЩЬ ДЕЙСТВИЙ - ЭТО ПОМОЩЬ ДВИЖЕНИЯ ПО ПУТИ (AID TO ACTION IS AID TO MOTION ALONG A PATH) }}{{Entailment |Entailment.Target entailment=cпособ действий (manner of action) |Entailment.Source inference=cпособ движения по пути (manner of motion along a path) |Entailment.Entailed metaphors=CПОСОБ ДЕЙСТВИЙ - ЭТО CПОСОБ ДВИЖЕНИЯ ПО ПУТИ (MANNER OF ACTION IS MANNER OF MOTION ALONG A PATH) }}{{Entailment |Entailment.Target entailment=осторожное действие (careful action) |Entailment.Source inference=oсторожное движениe по пути (careful motion along a path) |Entailment.Entailed metaphors=ОСТОРОЖНОЕ ДЕЙСТВИЕ - ЭТО OСТОРОЖНОЕ ДВИЖЕНИE ПО ПУТИ (CAREFUL ACTION IS CAREFUL MOTION ALONG A PATH) }}{{Entailment |Entailment.Target entailment=oпасное/ рискованное действие (dangerous/risky action) |Entailment.Source inference=опасное/ рискованное движениe по пути (dangerous/risky motion along a path) |Entailment.Entailed metaphors=OПАСНОЕ/ РИСКОВАННОЕ ДЕЙСТВИЕ - ЭТО ОПАСНОЕ/ РИСКОВАННОЕ ДВИЖЕНИE ПО ПУТИ (DANGEROUS/RISKY ACTION IS DANGEROUS/RISKY MOTION ALONG A PATH) }}{{Entailment}} |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Ветер с юга, с южного российского берега, ― это ветер в паруса экономического сотрудничества сопредельных стран. |Example.English translation=Wind from the south, from the southern Russian coast - is the wind in the sails of economic cooperation of neighboring countries. |Example.Provenance=http://www.ruscorpora.ru/en/search-main.html |Example.Comments=ПОМОЩЬ ДЕЙСТВИЙ - ЭТО ПОМОЩЬ ДВИЖЕНИЯ ПО ПУТИ (AID TO ACTION IS AID TO MOTION ALONG A PATH) }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Мужчинам сложно уследить за нашими мыслями, которые мы спешим облечь в слова, перескакивая с одной темы на другую. |Example.English translation=It is very hard for men to keep track of our thoughts, that we are anxious to put into words, jumping from one topic to another. |Example.Provenance=http://za-30.com/muzhchina-zhenschina/razgovor-s-muzhchinoy-2 |Example.Comments=CПОСОБ ДЕЙСТВИЙ - ЭТО CПОСОБ ДВИЖЕНИЯ ПО ПУТИ (MANNER OF ACTION IS MANNER OF MOTION ALONG A PATH) }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=И я на цыпочках ходил по ободку карьера, башку держал отвесом позвонков ― в кувшине. |Example.English translation=And I walked on eggshells being on the verge of a career, holding my head high - in the pitcher. |Example.Provenance=http://search.ruscorpora.ru |Example.Comments=ОСТОРОЖНОЕ ДЕЙСТВИЕ - ЭТО OСТОРОЖНОЕ ДВИЖЕНИE ПО ПУТИ (CAREFUL ACTION IS CAREFUL ALONG A PATH) }} |Entered by=Kristina, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

is the wind in the sails of economic cooperation of neighboring countries. |Example.Provenance=http://www.ruscorpora.ru/en/search-main.html |Example.Comments=ПОМОЩЬ ДЕЙСТВИЮ - ЭТО ПОМОЩЬ ДВИЖЕНИЮ ПО ПУТИ }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Мужчинам сложно уследить за нашими мыслями, которые мы спешим облечь в слова, перескакивая с одной темы на другую. |Example.Gloss=Man complicated follow after our thoughts, that we hurry clothe in letters, jumping from one topic to another |Example.Transcription=Muzhchinam slozhno usledit za nashimi myslyami, kotorye my speshim oblech v slova, pereskakivaya s odnoy temy na druguyu. |Example.English translation=It is very hard for men to keep track of our thoughts, that we are anxious to put into words, jumping from one topic to another. |Example.Provenance=http://za-30.com/muzhchina-zhenschina/razgovor-s-muzhchinoy-2 |Example.Comments=CПОСОБ ДЕЙСТВИЙ - ЭТО CПОСОБ ДВИЖЕНИЯ ПО ПУТИ }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=И я на цыпочках ходил по ободку карьера, башку держал отвесом позвонков ― в кувшине. |Example.Gloss=And I on chickens walked on verge career, head holding vertically spin - in pitcher. |Example.Transcription=I ya na tsypochkakh khodil po obodku karyera, bashku derzhal otvesom pozvonkov ― v kuvshine. |Example.English translation=And I walked on eggshells being on the verge of a career, holding my head high - in the pitcher. |Example.Provenance=http://search.ruscorpora.ru |Example.Comments=ОСТОРОЖНОЕ ДЕЙСТВИЕ - ЭТО OСТОРОЖНОЕ ДВИЖЕНИE ПО ПУТИ }} |Entered by=Kristina, |Last reviewed by=Aleksandra |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ACTION IS MOTION ALONG A PATH |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=NATION - IS FAMILY |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=NATION IS A FAMILY }} |Family=Метафоры управления (Governance metaphors), |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=cемья (family) |Target frame=нация (nation) |Mappings={{Mapping}} |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is in some way related to |Related metaphor.Name=ПРАВИТЕЛЬСТВО - ЭТО РОДИТЕЛЬ }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Люди Русские, братья и сёстры – славяне! |Example.Gloss=People Russian, brothers and sisters - Slavs! |Example.English translation= Russian people, brothers and sisters - the Slavs! |Example.Provenance=http://via-midgard.info/news/article/12143-otbroste-vash-strax-lyudi-russkie-bratya-i-sestry.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Где бы ни жили русские люди, мы знаем, что мы – одна семья. |Example.Gloss=Where would not live Russian people, we know, that we - one family. |Example.English translation=Wherever Russian people might live, we know that we are one family. |Example.Provenance=http://australianlampada.com/article/sobitia/sobitia_4862.html }} |Entered by=Kristina |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=NATION IS A FAMILY |Investigated for=Russian }}

We have common roots, we - one family |Example.English translation=We (Russiaans, Ukranians and Belarussians)used to be invincible, when we were together. {{Metaphor |Name gloss=LIFE is A RIVER (STREAM) |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ЖИЗНЬ - ЭТО РЕКА (ПОТОК) |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=Inna }} |Family=Life Metaphors, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Река |Target frame=Жизнь |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Name=LIFE IS A JOURNEY }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Мало найдется людей, чья жизнь от начала и до конца протекала бы гладко и ровно, в соответствии с одними и теми же убеждениями и идеалами |Example.Gloss=few people can be found whose life would flow smoothly and evenly from beginning to end, in accordance with the same beliefs and ideals. |Example.English translation=There are few people whose whole life would go on smoothly, in accordance with the same beliefs and ideals. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Сравнивая потенциалы рождений середины ХХ века и начала XXI века, видим: «русская река жизни усохнет» в 5 раз. |Example.Gloss=Comparing potentials of births in the late 20 century and early 21 century, we see: "Russian river of life will dry up" in 5 times. |Example.English translation=If we compare the birth rate in the late 20 century and early 21 century, we'' see that the Russian river of life will be 5 times shorter. |Example.Provenance=В. Башлачев. Русская демография }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=У нас на Арбате толпы снующих людей и жизнь бурлит |Example.Gloss=At us in Arbat crowds of scurrying people and life rages |Example.English translation=We have crouds of scurrying people in Arbat and life is raging. |Example.Provenance=В. Железников. Жизнь и приключения чудака |Example.Comments=Arbat is one of the main streets in Moscow where there is no traffic, designed only for pedestrians }} |Entered by=Inna, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=LIFE is A RIVER |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ЖИЗНЬ - ЭТО РЕКА (ПОТОК) |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=Inna }} |Family=Life Metaphors, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Река |Target frame=Жизнь |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Name=LIFE IS A JOURNEY }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Мало найдется людей, чья жизнь от начала и до конца протекала бы гладко и ровно, в соответствии с одними и теми же убеждениями и идеалами |Example.Gloss=few people can be found whose life would flow smoothly and evenly from beginning to end, in accordance with the same beliefs and ideals. |Example.English translation=There are few people whose whole life would go on smoothly, in accordance with the same beliefs and ideals. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Сравнивая потенциалы рождений середины ХХ века и начала XXI века, видим: «русская река жизни усохнет» в 5 раз. |Example.Gloss=Comparing potentials of births in the late 20 century and early 21 century, we see: "Russian river of life will dry up" in 5 times. |Example.English translation=If we compare the birth rate in the late 20 century and early 21 century, we'' see that the Russian river of life will be 5 times shorter. |Example.Provenance=В. Башлачев. Русская демография }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=У нас на Арбате толпы снующих людей и жизнь бурлит |Example.Gloss=At us in Arbat crowds of scurrying people and life rages |Example.English translation=We have crouds of scurrying people in Arbat and life is raging. |Example.Provenance=В. Железников. Жизнь и приключения чудака |Example.Comments=Arbat is one of the main streets in Moscow where there is no traffic, designed only for pedestrians }} |Entered by=Inna, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=BECOMING RICH - IS MOTION ALONG A PATH |Aliases= |Tags=Program sources |Family=Метафоры Богатство |Metaphor Level=Specific |Source frame=двигаться по пути до местонахождения |Target frame=становятся богатыми |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=ЦЕЛЕУСТРЕМЛЕННОЕ ДЕЙСТВИЕ - ЭТО ДВИЖЕНИЕ ПО ПУТИ }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=УЛУЧШЕНИЕ СОСТОЯНИЯ - ЭТО ДВИЖЕНИЕ ПО ПУТИ }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text= Чтобы открыть для себя путь к богатству – для этого нужно созреть! |Example.Gloss=To discover for yourself path to wealth - for that needs maturity! |Example.English translation=To discover your way to wealth - you need to be mature! |Example.Provenance=http://www.nelevex.com/2012/08/31/prichiny-bednosti/ }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=С чего начинается путь к богатству. |Example.Gloss=From where starts pathway to wealth? |Example.English translation=Where does the pathway to wealth start? |Example.Provenance=mlm-dva.ru/.../put-k-bogatstvu-s-chego-nach }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=На пути к богатству встречаются трудности, но нельзя останавливаться и сдаваться. |Example.Gloss=On path to wealth meet difficulties, but must_not stop and give_up. |Example.English translation=On the way to the wealth you might experience some difficulties, but do not stop and give up. |Example.Provenance=2rich.ru/ }} |Entered by=Metabot, |Last reviewed by=Kristina |Status=in development, auto imported |LinkEnglish=IMPROVING A STATE IS MOTION ALONG A PATH }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=AID ACTION - IS AID MOTION ALONG PATH |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ПОМОЩЬ ДЕЙСТВИЮ - ЭТО ПОМОЩЬ ДВИЖЕНИЮ ПО ПУТИ |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=PITF |Metaphor.Alias.Page no=188 }} |Family=Метафора структуры события,Метафора структуры события - локация, Russian primary metaphors, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary, Entailed |Experiential basis=движение |Source frame=помощь движению по пути |Target frame=помощь действию |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=aктер |Source=двигатель }}{{Mapping |Target=x-схема действий (action_x-schema) |Source=x-схема движения (motion_x-schema) }}{{Mapping |Target=помощь действию |Source=помощь движению по пути }} |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=ДЕЙСТВИЕ - ЭТО ДВИЖЕНИЕ ПО ПУТИ }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Ветер с юга, с южного российского берега, ― это ветер в паруса экономического сотрудничества сопредельных стран. |Example.Gloss=Wind from south, from southern Rusian coast - is wind in sails economic cooperation neighboring countries. |Example.English translation=Wind from the south, from the southern Russian coast - is the wind in the sails of economic cooperation of neighboring countries. |Example.Provenance=http://www.ruscorpora.ru/en/search-main.html }} |Entered by=Kristina, |Last reviewed by=Aleksandra |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ARGUMENT IS WAR |Investigated for=Russian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=AID ACTION - IS AID MOTION ALONG PATH |Name transcription=POMOSHCH DEYSTVIYU - ETO POMOSHCH DVIZHENIYU PO PUTI |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ПОМОЩЬ ДЕЙСТВИЮ - ЭТО ПОМОЩЬ ДВИЖЕНИЮ ПО ПУТИ |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=PITF |Metaphor.Alias.Page no=188 }} |Family=Метафора структуры события,Метафора структуры события - локация, Russian primary metaphors, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary, Entailed |Experiential basis=движение |Source frame=помощь движению по пути |Target frame=помощь действию |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=aктер |Source=двигатель }}{{Mapping |Target=x-схема действий (action_x-schema) |Source=x-схема движения (motion_x-schema) }}{{Mapping |Target=помощь действию |Source=помощь движению по пути }} |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=ДЕЙСТВИЕ - ЭТО ДВИЖЕНИЕ ПО ПУТИ }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Ветер с юга, с южного российского берега, ― это ветер в паруса экономического сотрудничества сопредельных стран. |Example.Gloss=Wind from south, from southern Rusian coast - is wind in sails economic cooperation neighboring countries. |Example.Transcription=Veter s yuga, s yuzhnogo rossiyskogo berega, ― eto veter v parusa ekonomicheskogo sotrudnichestva sopredelnykh stran. |Example.English translation=Wind from the south, from the southern Russian coast - is the wind in the sails of economic cooperation of neighboring countries. |Example.Provenance=http://www.ruscorpora.ru/en/search-main.html }} |Entered by=Kristina, |Last reviewed by=Aleksandra |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ARGUMENT IS WAR |Investigated for=Russian }}

Jhong переименовал страницу [[МОРАЛЬ - ЭТО ЧИСТОТА (НЕПОРОЧНОСТЬ)]] в [[Metaphor:МОРАЛЬ - ЭТО ЧИСТОТА (НЕПОРОЧНОСТЬ)]] без оставления перенаправлени…

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=MORALITY - IS PURITY |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=МОРАЛЬ - ЭТО ЧИСТОТА |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=Metaphors We Live By, Philosophy in the Flesh }} |Family=Метафоры Морали |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Чистота |Target frame=Мораль |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Обливать друг друга грязью очень опасно. Некоторые люди не знают, где помыть свои руки после выборов. |Example.Gloss=To pour each other (instr.case) mud very dangerous. Some people not know where to wash hands after elections. |Example.English translation=Throwing mud at each other is a very dangerous thing. Some people don’t know where to wash their hands after the elections |Example.Provenance=kommersant.ru }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Чиновники умывают руки - разрешение они дали, а отслеживать, как медицинское средство продается и используется, в их компетенцию не входит. |Example.Gloss=Officials wash hands - authorization they gave,and to track how remedy sells and is used, into their competence not enter. |Example.English translation=Officials are washing their hands - they gave the authorization, but tracking the way a remedy is sold and used doesn't fall within their competence. |Example.Provenance=medrelax.narod.ru/pribor.htm |Example.Comments=The set expression "to wash one's hands" is used in Russian to denote reluctance of a person to participate in smth bad or illegal, to emphasize he/she is innocent. It originates from the old tradition to wash one's hands and say loudly "I'm innocent" to prove he/she has nothing to do with a certain criminal act. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Моя совесть чиста перед моей семьей и народом. Но у них совесть грязная. Они осуждены за грязные проделки в своей профессиональной деятельности. |Example.Gloss=My conscience pure in front of my family and people. But they are convicted for dirty shenanigans in professional activity. |Example.English translation=My conscience is pure in front of my family and people. But they are convicted for dirty shenanigans in their professional activity. |Example.Provenance=ru.hrsu.org/archives/3548 }} |Entered by=Inna, |Last reviewed by=Kristina |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=MORALITY IS PURITY |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=MORALITY - IS PURITY |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=МОРАЛЬ - ЭТО ЧИСТОТА |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=Metaphors We Live By, Philosophy in the Flesh }} |Family=Метафоры Морали |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Чистота |Target frame=Мораль |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Обливать друг друга грязью очень опасно. Некоторые люди не знают, где помыть свои руки после выборов. |Example.Gloss=To pour each other (instr.case) mud very dangerous. Some people not know where to wash hands after elections. |Example.English translation=Throwing mud at each other is a very dangerous thing. Some people don’t know where to wash their hands after the elections |Example.Provenance=kommersant.ru }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Чиновники умывают руки - разрешение они дали, а отслеживать, как медицинское средство продается и используется, в их компетенцию не входит. |Example.Gloss=Officials wash hands - authorization they gave,and to track how remedy sells and is used, into their competence not enter. |Example.English translation=Officials are washing their hands - they gave the authorization, but tracking the way a remedy is sold and used doesn't fall within their competence. |Example.Provenance=medrelax.narod.ru/pribor.htm |Example.Comments=The set expression "to wash one's hands" is used in Russian to denote reluctance of a person to participate in smth bad or illegal, to emphasize he/she is innocent. It originates from the old tradition to wash one's hands and say loudly "I'm innocent" to prove he/she has nothing to do with a certain criminal act. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Моя совесть чиста перед моей семьей и народом. Но у них совесть грязная. Они осуждены за грязные проделки в своей профессиональной деятельности. |Example.Gloss=My conscience pure in front of my family and people. But they are convicted for dirty shenanigans in professional activity. |Example.English translation=My conscience is pure in front of my family and people. But they are convicted for dirty shenanigans in their professional activity. |Example.Provenance=ru.hrsu.org/archives/3548 }} |Entered by=Inna, |Last reviewed by=Kristina |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=MORALITY IS PURITY |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.comment: Новая страница: «{{Metaphor |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=СТРАНА - ЭТО ТЕЛО |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=Михаил Веллер |Metaphor.Alias.Page...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=СТРАНА - ЭТО ТЕЛО |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=Михаил Веллер |Metaphor.Alias.Page no=www. weller.ru }} |Family=социальная (social), антропоморфная (Bodily Functioning Metaphors) |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=ТЕЛО |Target frame=СТРАНА |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Name=ОБЩЕСТВО - ЭТО ЧЕЛОВЕК }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Россия - это огромный организм, и никто не знает,что с ним делать |Example.Gloss=Russia is a huge organism, and nobody knows what to do with it. |Example.English translation=Russia is a huge organism and nobody knows how to deal with it. |Example.Provenance=www. weller.ru }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Позволить некоторым членам Федерации уйти - значит отрезать кусок от тела России. |Example.Gloss=To let some subjects of the Federation go means to cut off a piece of the Russian body. |Example.English translation=To let some subjects of the Federation go means to cut off some part of the Russian body |Example.Provenance=Putin's speech }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=США размяло мышцы своей армии, демонстрируя свои вооружения. |Example.Gloss=The USA pomelled the muscles of its army, demonstrating the new armaments. |Example.English translation=The USA has stretched the muscles of its army, demonstrating their new armaments. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Руки России становятся все сильнее и сильнее. Даже самые сильные партнеры (Евросоюз)не могут их выкрутить. |Example.Gloss=The arms of Russia are getting stronger with each day. Even such strongest partners as the EU can’t twist them |Example.English translation=Russia’s arms are getting stronger and stronger. Even the strongest partners (the EU) can’t twist them }} |Entered by=Inna |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=CONTROL - IS BOUNDED REGION |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=CONTROL IS A BOUNDED REGION }} |Family=Метафоры управления (Governance metaphors), |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source frame=Ограниченная область (Bounded region) |Target frame=Контроль (Control) |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is in some way related to |Related metaphor.Name=СОСТОЯНИЯ - ЭТО ЛОКАЦИИ }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=ХXI век – век беспредельных возможностей, где границы контроля разума открывают свои горизонты. |Example.Gloss=XXI century - century limitless possibilities, where boundaries control mind opening their horizons. |Example.English translation=Twenty-first century - the century of the limitless possibilities, where the boundaries of mind control are opening their horizons. |Example.Provenance=news.onru.ru/.../Razdvigaja-granicy-kontrol. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Жизнь — за пределами вашего контроля. |Example.Gloss=Life - outside region your control. |Example.English translation=Life - outside of your control. |Example.Provenance=magic-sucess.com/?p=635 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Сегодня хочу порекомендовать вам последний фильм Дж. Джармуша «Предел контроля». |Example.Gloss=Today, want recommend you latest film J. Jarmusch "Region Control." |Example.English translation=Today, I want to recommend you the latest J. Jarmush film "The Limits of Control." }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text= Особое неудовольствие Путина вызвали «системные сбои» находящихся явно за пределами контроля правительства. |Example.Gloss=Special displeasure Putin caused "systemic failures" being clearly outside region control government. |Example.English translation=Putin was especially displeased with "systemic failures", which are clearly outside the control of the government. |Example.Provenance=newtimes.ru/articles/detail/57428/ }} |Entered by=Kristina, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=CONTROL IS BOUNDED REGION |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.comment: Новая страница: «{{Metaphor |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ЛЮДИ - ЭТО ЖИВОТНЫЕ }} |Family=Zoomorphic metaphors |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Typ...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ЛЮДИ - ЭТО ЖИВОТНЫЕ }} |Family=Zoomorphic metaphors |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Animals |Target frame=Person |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Американцы должны молчать, а не мычать. Почему они засадили Ассанжа в тюрьму? Есть русская пословица "Чья бы корова мычала, а твоя бы молчала" |Example.Gloss=Americans should be silent and not moo. Why did they send Assange to jail? Is it democracy? There is a Russian proverb “Whatever cow moos, it shouldn’t be yours” |Example.English translation=Americans should be silent and not moo. Why did they send Assange to jail? Is it democracy? There is a Russian proverb “Who's talking, and your silence would”. |Example.Provenance=Putin's speech |Example.Comments=about Americans criticizing Russian democracy while commenting on persecution of Julian Assange - WikiLeaks. The meaning of the proverb - one shouldn't criticize or blame others for doing smth, if one does the same. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Попугаи-коммунисты привыкли выкрикивать устаревшие лозунги. |Example.Gloss=Communist parrots got used to yelling out outdated slogans |Example.English translation=Communist parrots got used to referring to outdated slogans |Example.Provenance=Zhirinovsky's speech (the leader of the Liberal Democratic Party) }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=А акулы бизнеса поняли, что было бы лучше разделиться на несколько маленьких рыб и попасть под единый налог. |Example.Gloss=And business sharks realized it would be better to split into several small fishes and dive under the unitary tax. |Example.English translation=And business sharks realized it would be better to split into several small fishes and pay the unitary tax. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Я бы вряд ли это сделал, если бы вилял хвостом (заискивал) перед губернаторами. |Example.Gloss=I would hardly do it if I wagged the tail in front of governors |Example.English translation=I would hardly do it if I curried favor with the governors }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Я,как таракан в армированной банке,хожу из резиденции в Кремль и обратно. |Example.Gloss=I'm like a cockroach in an armored pot running from the residence to the Kremlin and back |Example.English translation=I'm like a cockroach in an armored pot going from the residence to the Kremlin and back |Example.Provenance=Putin's speech }} |Entered by=Inna |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

The meaning of the proverb - one shouldn't criticize or blame others for doing smth, if one does the same. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Попугаи-коммунисты привыкли выкрикивать устаревшие лозунги. |Example.Gloss=Communist parrots got used to yelling out outdated slogans |Example.English translation=Communist parrots got used to referring to outdated slogans |Example.Provenance=Zhirinovsky's speech }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=А акулы бизнеса поняли, что было бы лучше разделиться на несколько маленьких рыб и попасть под единый налог. |Example.Gloss=And business sharks realized it would be better to split into several small fishes and dive under the unitary tax. |Example.English translation=And business sharks realized it would be better to split into several small fishes and pay the unitary tax. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Я бы вряд ли это сделал, если бы вилял хвостом (заискивал) перед губернаторами. |Example.Gloss=I would hardly do it if I wagged the tail in front of governors |Example.English translation=I would hardly do it if I curried favor with the governors }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Я,как таракан в армированной банке,хожу из резиденции в Кремль и обратно. |Example.Gloss=I'm like a cockroach in an armored pot running from the residence to the Kremlin and back |Example.English translation=I'm like a cockroach in an armored pot going from the residence to the Kremlin and back |Example.Provenance=Putin's speech }} |Entered by=Inna |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=UNITY IS A FORCE |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ЕДИНСТВО - ЭТО СИЛА |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=Inna }} |Family=Well-being Metaphors, |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=СИЛА |Target frame=ЕДИНСТВО |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Пока мы едины, мы непобедимы! |Example.Gloss=As long as we are united, we are invincible! |Example.English translation=As long as we are united, we are invincible! |Example.Provenance=sangit.livejournal.com |Example.Comments=It's a very popular Russian saying, often used as a political slogan or sports motto }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Чувствуя себя единым народом Россия всегда преодолевала трудности. |Example.Gloss=Feeling themselves as united people, Russia always overcame difficulties. |Example.English translation=Russia has always overcome all the difficulties, when its people feel they're united. |Example.Provenance=Putin's speech }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Сила России - в единстве ее народов! |Example.Gloss=Force of Russia - in the unity of its peoples! |Example.English translation=The unity of peoples is the main Russian force! |Example.Provenance=R. revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=MONEY IS A LIQUID |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ДЕНЬГИ - ЭТО ЖИДКОСТЬ |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=Inna }} |Family=Object Event Structure Metaphor, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Жидкость |Target frame=Деньги |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Вроде бы, будто на днях вы получили зарплату. Вы уверены, что не приобретали никаких дорогих вещей. А деньги, куда-то испарились |Example.Gloss=I sort of received my salary the other day. I'm sure i didn't buy any expensive things. But money evaporated somewhere! |Example.English translation=I sort of received my salary the other day. I'm sure i didn't buy anything expensive. But my money have evaporated somewhere! |Example.Provenance=progyouth.ru }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=По старым трубам бюджетные деньги утекают, как вода в песок |Example.Gloss=Into old pipes budget money flows away like water in sand |Example.English translation=Public money is flowing away into the old pipes like water into the sand |Example.Provenance=http://www.ogoniok.com }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Деньги просачиваются чуть-чуть и достаются тем, кто эту буржуазию кормит, поит и веселит |Example.Gloss=Money leak slightly and accrue to those who this bourgeoisie feeds, waters and tickles. |Example.English translation=Money is leaking little by little to those, who feeds, waters and tickles the bourgeoisie. |Example.Provenance=http://www.ogoniok.com }} |Entered by=Inna, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

Новая страница: «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=AUTHORITIES ARE EVIL-DOERS (CRIMINALS) |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ВЛАСТИ - ЭТО ЗЛОДЕИ (ПРЕСТУПН...»
revision.text:
{{Metaphor |Name gloss=AUTHORITIES ARE EVIL-DOERS (CRIMINALS) |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ВЛАСТИ - ЭТО ЗЛОДЕИ (ПРЕСТУПНИКИ) }} |Family=Social Metaphors, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Злодеи (преступники) |Target frame=Власти |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Власть наплевала на голоса избирателей, устроила беспредел, тем больше права мы имеем на протест, на отмену сфальсифицированных выборов и на проведение новых, уже без Путина.
|Example.Gloss=Authorities spitted on votes of people, arranged lawlessness. Thus, the more rights we have on protests, on cancellation of elections and on organizing new, already without Putin. |Example.English translation=Authorities spitted upon the people's votes, making such a mess. Thus, we have more rights to protests, to the anullment of fabricated elections and to holding the new ones, but without Putin. |Example.Provenance=www.regnum.ru/news }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=К партии «Единая Россия» я отношусь очень плохо. Партия «Единая Россия» — это партия коррупции, это партия жуликов и воров. |Example.Gloss=To party "United Russia" i treat very bad. "United Russia" is party of corruption, party of swindlers and thiefs. |Example.English translation=My attitude to "United Russia" is radically negative. "United Russia" is the party of corruption, the party of swindlers and thiefs. |Example.Provenance=Y. Navalnyj - the leader of opposition }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Оказывается надо молиться, чтобы народ власть не ругал,а если эта власть народ оббирает до нитки, то тогда как? |Example.Gloss=Turns out we need to pray, so that people didn't scold our authorities, but if these authorities rob people to thread, then what? |Example.English translation=It turns out we should pray, so that people didn't scold our authorities,but what if these authorities are robbing people to te skin, what shall we do then? |Example.Provenance=www.mixnews.lv/ru/society/news }} |Entered by=Inna, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=BEING IMPOVERISHED IS BEING IN A BOUNDED REGION |Aliases= |Family=Бедность (Poverty) |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=" быть в ограниченной области (Being in a Bounded Region)" |Target frame=Оказаться обедневший (Being impoverished) |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=ИСПЫТЫВАТЬ СОСТОЯНИЕ - ЭТО БЫТЬ В МЕСТОНАХОЖДЕНИИ }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Папа наказал кардиналам жить в бедности. |Example.Gloss=Pope ordered cardinals to live in poverty |Example.English translation=The Pope instructed cardinals to live in poverty |Example.Provenance=http://www.telegraf.lv/news/papa-nakazal-kardinalam-zhity-v-bednosti }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=многие из них существуют в бедности и изоляции, как в отдаленных резервациях, так и в больших городах. |Example.Gloss=Many of them exist in poverty and isolation both in remote reserves, and in large cities. |Example.English translation=Many of them exist in poverty and isolation both in remote reserves, and in large cities. |Example.Provenance=http://www.cdnexperience.ca/ru/read-the-series/24-first-nations-european-contact-to-the-present/ }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Почему Иисус родился в бедности, а Церковь в богатстве? |Example.Gloss=Why Jesus born in poverty, and Church born in richness? |Example.English translation=Why Jesus was born in poverty, and the Church was born in richness? |Example.Provenance=http://www.katolik.ru/vopros-otvet/110768-pochemu-iisus-rodilsya-v-bednosti-a-tserkov-v-bogatstve.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=В Кыргызстане 21,4% населения проживает в нищете. |Example.Gloss=In Kyrgyzstan, 21.4% of population resides in poverty. |Example.English translation=In Kyrgyzstan, 21.4% of the population resides in poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.kabar.kg/rus/society/full/48743 }} |Entered by=Kristina, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=BEING IMPOVERISHED IS BEING IN A BOUNDED REGION |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=EASE OF UTILIZING EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES IS INCREASE EASE OF ACCESSING A LOCATION |Aliases= |Tags=Program sources |Family=Метафоры Доступ к образованию |Metaphor Level=Specific |Source frame=Повышение легкости доступа местонахождению |Target frame=Образовательные возможности |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=ИЗМЕНЕНИЕ СОСТОЯНИЯ - ЭТО ИЗМЕНЕНИЕ МЕСТОНАХОЖДЕНИЯ }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=В Украине отмечается тенденция к сужению доступа к высшему образованию. |Example.Gloss=In Ukraine, there_is a_trend towards narrowing access to a_higher education. |Example.English translation=In Ukraine, there is a trend towards narrowing access to a higher education. |Example.Provenance=rus.newsru.ua › 12 августа 2012 г. › Украина‎ }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Основной чертой вступительной кампании, которая завершена, стало сужение доступа к высшему образованию |Example.Gloss=The_main line of_the_introductory campaign, that is_completed, became the_narrowing of_access to higher education |Example.English translation=The main feature of the introductory campaign that is completed, became the narrowing of access to higher education |Example.Provenance=www.unn.com.ua/.../886768-vstupitelnaya-kampaniya }} |Entered by=Metabot, |Last reviewed by=Kristina |Status=in development, auto imported |LinkEnglish=EASE OF UTILIZING EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES IS INCREASE EASE OF ACCESSING A LOCATION }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=BEING IN STATE - IS BEING IN LOCATION |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EXPERIENCING A STATE IS BEING AT A LOCATION }} |Comments=proposed variation of States Are Locations.

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=POVERTY IS A DISEASE |Name transcription=BEDNOST - ETO BOLEZN |Aliases= |Family=Newly added metaphors, |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Cultural scope=American English, Persian, Russian |Source frame=Болезнь |Target frame=Бедность |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=В мире начнется эпидемия бедности. |Example.Gloss=In the_world begins the_epidemic of_poverty |Example.Transcription=V mire nachinaetsya epidemiya bednosti |Example.English translation=The epidemic of poverty is begining around the world. |Example.Provenance=www.dni.ru/economy/2008/4/14/132285.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Бедность – это вирусное заболевание, передаваемое по наследству. |Example.Gloss=Poverty - is a_viral disease, transfered by succession |Example.Transcription=Bednost – eto virusnoye zabolevaniye, peredavayemoye po nasledstvu. |Example.English translation=Poverty is a heritable viral disease. |Example.Provenance=http://www.fintraining.ru/modules.php?op=modload&name=News&file=article&sid=463 }} |Entered by=Aleksandra, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=POVERTY IS A DISEASE |Investigated for=Russian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=POVERTY IS A DISEASE |Name transcription=BEDNOST - ETO BOLEZN |Aliases= |Family=Newly added metaphors, |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Cultural scope=American English, Persian, Russian |Source frame=Болезнь |Target frame=Бедность |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=В мире начнется эпидемия бедности. |Example.Gloss=In the_world begins the_epidemic of_poverty |Example.Transcription=V mire nachinaetsya epidemiya bednosti |Example.English translation=The epidemic of poverty is begining around the world. |Example.Provenance=www.dni.ru/economy/2008/4/14/132285.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Бедность – это вирусное заболевание, передаваемое по наследству. |Example.Gloss=Poverty - is a_viral disease, transfered by succession |Example.Transcription=Bednost – eto virusnoye zabolevaniye, peredavayemoye po nasledstvu. |Example.English translation=Poverty is a heritable viral disease. |Example.Provenance=http://www.fintraining.ru/modules.php?op=modload&name=News&file=article&sid=463 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Синдром бедности тесно связан с психологией бедности, явлением не только социальным, но и личным, ведь бедность – это не только минимальный доход, но и особый образ и стиль жизни, это и передающиеся из поколения в поколение нормы поведения, стереотипы восприятия и психология. |Example.Transcription=Sindrom bednosti tesno svyazan s psikhologiyey bednosti, yavleniyem ne tolko sotsialnym, no i lichnym, ved bednost – eto ne tolko minimalny dokhod, no i osoby obraz i stil zhizni, eto i peredayushchiyesya iz pokoleniya v pokoleniye normy povedeniya, stereotipy vospriyatiya i psikhologiya. |Example.Provenance= http://maxpark.com/community/2428/content/844533 }} |Entered by=Aleksandra, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=POVERTY IS A DISEASE |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=CORRUPTION IS EVIL (DIRT) |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=КОРРУПЦИЯ - ЭТО ЗЛО (ГРЯЗЬ) |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=Inna }} |Family=Social Metaphors, Purity Metaphors, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=ЗЛО (ГРЯЗЬ) |Target frame=КОРРУПЦИЯ |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Коррупция разъела и уничтожила правоохранительную систему |Example.Gloss=Corruption corroded and destroyed law-enforcement system. |Example.English translation=Corruption in Russia has corroded and destroyed the law-enforcement system |Example.Provenance=www.putin-itogi.ru/putin-i-korruptsiya }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Коррупция метастазами сковала экономическую и социальную жизнь страны |Example.Gloss=Corruption (instr.) metastases fettered economic and social life of nation. |Example.English translation=Corruption has fettered economic and social life of nation with its metastases. |Example.Provenance=www.putin-itogi.ru/putin-i-korruptsiya }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Коррупцию усугубляет и главный путинский принцип управления: «Друзьям — все, остальным — беспредел» |Example.Gloss=Corruption is aggravated by Putin main principle of management: "To friends - everything, to the rest - lawlessness". |Example.English translation=Putin's main management principle " Everyting for friends, lawlessness for the rest" aggravates corruption. |Example.Provenance=www.putin-itogi.ru/putin-i-korruptsiya }} |Entered by=Inna, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=DEMOCRACY IS A PLANT |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ДЕМОКРАТИЯ - ЭТО РАСТЕНИЕ |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=P.V. Kropotukhina }} |Family=Social Metaphors, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Растение |Target frame=Демокатия |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Name=PEOPLE ARE PLANTS }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Демократия с евролицом у нас почему-то не прорастает. |Example.Gloss=Democracy with Euroface at us somehow doesn't sprout. |Example.English translation=Democracy with the European face somehiow doesn't sprout in our country. |Example.Provenance=V. Kostokov "Arguments and Facts", 2010, № 35 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Зреет ли в России настоящая демократия? |Example.Gloss=Ripen not in Russia real democracy? |Example.English translation=Is the real democracy ripening in Russia? |Example.Provenance=Newsland.ru. 05/08/2010 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text="Революция роз" увяла на морозе. |Example.Gloss="Revolution of roses" withered in the frost. |Example.English translation="The Rose Revolution" has withered in the cold. |Example.Provenance=A. Gabuev "Kommersant" |Example.Comments=By the Rose Revolution as well as the Orange Revolution we mean democratic revolutions in former USSR countries. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Опыт показывает, что под контолем тоталитарной власти может вырасти только фиговый демокатический листок. |Example.Gloss=Experience shows that under control of totalitarian power can grow only a fig democratic leaf. |Example.English translation=Our past experience shows that only a fig leaf of democracy can grow up under the totalitarian regime. |Example.Provenance=www.futurisrael.org/Authors/Borovsky_Dem.html |Example.Comments="fig" in Russian can mean both "a fig tree" and "smth bad" (slang)- фиговое }} |Entered by=Inna, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=PEOPLE ARE MACHINES (MECHANISMS) |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ЛЮДИ - ЭТО МАШИНЫ (МЕХАНИЗМЫ) |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=Metaphors We Live By, Philosophy in the Flesh }} |Family=Social Metaphors, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=МАШИНЫ (МЕХАНИЗМЫ) |Target frame=ЛЮДИ |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Директор небольшого завода стал не только аккумулятором всех оппозиционных сил, но и превратился в успешного хозяйственника |Example.Gloss=Director of a small plant became not only accumulator of all opposition forces but also turned into a successful handyman. |Example.English translation=The director of a small plant has become not only a battery of the whole opposition but also has turned into a successful handyman. |Example.Provenance=S. Sorokin }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Первый зам у нас выступает как буфер между генеральным директором и руководителями подразделений. |Example.Gloss=First deputy with us acts as buffer between Director General and Divivsions Manager |Example.English translation=The first deputy of our company serves as a buffer Director General and Divivsions Manager. |Example.Provenance=G. Ananjev }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Ходят слухи, что вас могут отключить от рубильника? - Не отключат! |Example.Gloss=Rumors go that you can be disconnected from the circuit breaker? - Won't disconnect! |Example.English translation=Rumors are in the air you can be disconnected from the circuit breaker? - No way to do so! |Example.Provenance=N. Efimovich }} |Entered by=Inna, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ЛЮДИ - ЭТО РАСТЕНИЯ |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=Metaphors We Live By }} |Family=Social Metaphors, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Plants |Target frame=Person |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is in some target relation to |Related metaphor.Name=SOCIAL ORGANIZATIONS ARE PLANTS }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text="Яблоневое дерево" хорошо растет в Санкт-Петербурге и дает хорошие плоды. |Example.Gloss=“The apple tree” grows well in St. Petersburg and bears good fruit |Example.English translation=“The apple tree” is growing well in St. Petersburg bearing good fruit |Example.Provenance=Yavlinsky's speech |Example.Comments=By "the appple tree" the members of the Russian democratic party “Yabloko” – “Apple” is meant. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Я не думаю, что олигархи сгнили, я думаю, они притворились наполовину мертвыми. |Example.Gloss=I don’t think the oligarchs have become rotten, I think they just pretend they are half-dead |Example.English translation=I don’t think the oligarchs have become rotten, I think they just pretend to be half-dead |Example.Provenance=Putin's speech }} |Entered by=Inna |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.comment: Новая страница: «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=COUNTRY (NATION) IS A HOUSE (BUILDING) |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=СТРАНА - ЭТО ДОМ (ЗДАНИЕ) |Metapho...»
revision.text:
{{Metaphor |Name gloss=COUNTRY (NATION) IS A HOUSE (BUILDING) |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=СТРАНА - ЭТО ДОМ (ЗДАНИЕ) |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=A.P. Chudinov }} |Family=Social Metaphors, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=ДОМ (ЗДАНИЕ) |Target frame=СТРАНА (ГОСУДАРСТВО) |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Утащить с хозяйской кухни вкусный кусочек технологий, а затем съесть его под одеялом,стараясь не чавкать. Нет, мы так бизнес не ведем.
|Example.Gloss=To filch from host's kitchen a tasty piece of technologies, and then to eat it under blanket, trying not to slurp. No, we so not conduct business. |Example.English translation=To steal from the host’s kitchen a tasty piece of technology, and then to eat it under the blanket trying not to slurp. No, we’re not doing business like that.” (Putin)
|Example.Provenance=vedomosti.ru }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Мы пришли к экономическому коллапсу и бедности из-за того, что наши двери открыты. Как мы можем говорить о порядке в доме,если у нас нет дверей и замков?
|Example.Gloss=We came to ecocnomic collapse and poverty because our doors are open. How we can speak about order in our house if at us no doors and locks. |Example.English translation=We’ve come to economic collapse and poverty due to our open doors. How can we speak about order in the house, if we don’t have doors and locks?
|Example.Provenance=vedomosti.ru }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Американская инициатива - это не что иное, как предложение "сжечь дом для того, чтобы приготовить омлет"
|Example.Gloss=American initiative is not what other, as suggestion "to burn house for that to cook omelette" |Example.English translation=The American initiative is nothing but a suggestion “to burn the house in order to cook an omelette” |Example.Provenance=vedomosti.ru |Example.Comments=Putin commenting on creating ballistic missile defense system }} |Entered by=Inna, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=COUNTRY (NATION) IS A HOUSE (BUILDING) |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=СТРАНА - ЭТО ДОМ (ЗДАНИЕ) |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=A.P. revision.comment: Новая страница: «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=GOVERNMENT - IS REFEREE |Aliases= |Tags=mapping, tentative |Family=Метафоры правительственных функций, М…»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=GOVERNMENT - IS REFEREE |Aliases= |Tags=mapping, tentative |Family=Метафоры правительственных функций, Метафоры управления, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Рефери |Target frame=Правительство |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Ислам предусматривает свободу вероисповедания, и поэтому руководитель такой страны не должен отдавать какой-либо религии приоритет, он должен быть нейтральным арбитром. |Example.Gloss=Islam provides freedom of_religion, and therefore head of_such a_country not should give any religion priority, he must be neutral arbitrator. |Example.English translation=Islam provides for the freedom of religion, and therefore the head of an Islamic country should not give priority to any religion, he must be a neutral referee. |Example.Provenance=http://delo.kg/index.php/religiya/5151-besedy-ob-islame-zakon-sud-vlast }} |Entered by=Kristina, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=GOVERNMENT IS REFEREE |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=DEBT - IS PHYSICAL IMPEDIMENT TO MOTION |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Препятствия для движения |Target frame=Долг |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=ТРУДНОСТИ - ЭТО ПРЕПЯТСТВИЯ ДЛЯ ДВИЖЕНИЯ }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=если честно, то пока что только эта "задолженность" удерживает меня от перехода со следующего расчётного периода на бету. |Example.Gloss=if honestly, it just that only this "debt" keeps me from moving to the_next accounting period on beta |Example.English translation=honestly speaking, it is only this "debt" that keeps me from moving to the next accounting period on beta |Example.Provenance=http://forum.tis-dialog.ru/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=53961 }} |Entered by=Kristina, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DEBT IS PHYSICAL IMPEDIMENTS TO MOTION |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=CAUSING ECONOMIC HARDSHIP - IS CAUSING PHYSICAL HARM |Aliases= |Tags=Program sources |Family=Метафоры Бедность,Метафоры Налогообложение |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Физический вред |Target frame=Экономическая трудность |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=ТРУДНОСТИ В ДЕЙСТВИИ - ЭТО ФИЗИЧЕСКИЙ ВРЕД }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=ЭКОНОМИЧЕСКИЕ ТРУДНОСТИ - ЭТО ФИЗИЧЕСКИЙ ВРЕД }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Резкий рост налогов повредит нашей экономике. |Example.Gloss=The_sharp increase of_taxes will_hurt our economy. |Example.English translation=The sharp increase in taxes will hurt our economy. |Example.Provenance=http://www.golos-ameriki.ru/content/usa-taxes-increase/1205925.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Эксперты считают, что: повышение налоговых порог может нанести вред интересам с низким уровнем дохода. |Example.Gloss=Experts believe, that: increase of_tax threshold may inflict harm to_interests with low level of_income. |Example.English translation=Experts believe that: increase the tax threshold may harm the interests of low-income countries. |Example.Provenance=http://www.sourcejuice.com/1355161/2010/07/21/ }} |Entered by=Metabot, |Last reviewed by=Kristina |Status=in development, auto imported |LinkEnglish=CAUSING ECONOMIC HARDSHIP IS CAUSING PHYSICAL HARM }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=POLITICS IS A PERFORMANCE (THEATER, CIRCUS) |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ПОЛИТИКА - ЭТО ПРЕДСТАВЛЕНИЕ (ТЕАТР, ЦИРК) |Metaphor.Alias.Provenance=A.P. Chudinov }} |Family=Social Metaphors, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=ПРЕДСТАВЛЕНИЕ (ТЕАТР, ЦИРК) |Target frame=ПОЛИТИКА |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Наша политика - это цирк, но это не значит, что все должны быть клоунами. |Example.Gloss=Our politics is circus, but it not mean that everybody should be clowns |Example.English translation=Our politics is a circus, but it doesn't mean everybody should be clowns. |Example.Provenance=Yavlinskij - leader of "Yabloko" party }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Кремль - это единственный дирижер Государственной Думы. |Example.Gloss=Kremlin is only conductor of State Duma. |Example.English translation=Kremlin is the only conductor of the State Duma |Example.Provenance=G. Zyuganov - Communist Party leader }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=В первой части этой политической драмы окрружению Путина удалось получить все ключевые должности, а во второй части они вдруг начали убеждать нас, что все было справедливо |Example.Gloss=In first part of this political dramaentourage of Putin managed to get al key positions, and in second one they suddenly started to persuade us that everything was fair. |Example.English translation=In the first part of this political drama Putin’s entourage managed to get all the key positions, and in the second one they suddenly started to persuade us everything was fair. |Example.Provenance=G. Zyuganov - Communist Party leader }} |Entered by=Inna, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=GOVERNMENT IS A PLANT |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias}} |Family=Social Metaphors, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Растение |Target frame=Власть |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=PEOPLE ARE PLANTS }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Официальная Россия, включая все органы, институты, участки, отделения, комитеты и министерства, — это продукт разложения советской государственной системы. Единственный процесс, который полным ходом идет в российском государстве (не в обществе, не в стране, а именно в структурах государства), — это разложение. Гниение системы началось до формального конца СССР и продолжается на наших глазах.. Мы каждый день получаем новую порцию продуктов распада: новое преступление людей в погонах, новый приговор купленного суда. |Example.English translation=Official Russia, including its authorities, institutions, police stations, departments, committees and ministries, is a product of decomposition of the Soviet national system.The only process, which is well under way in the Russian state (neither in the society,nor in the country, but in governmental structures) is decomposition. The rot of the system started long before the formal collapse of the USSR and is going before our eyes. We get a serving of breakdown product every day: a new crime of people in uniform, a new sentence of the corrupt court. |Example.Provenance=www.vedomosti.ru/opinion/news/1538709/fundament_novoj_respubliki }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=В конце концов, такие пирамидальные системы (государства, корпорации, церкви) загнивают и разрушаются, |Example.Gloss=In the end of ends, such pyramidal systems (governments, corporations, churches)are becoming rotten and extinct. |Example.English translation=After all, such pyramidal systems (governments, corporations, churches)are becoming rotten and extinct. |Example.Provenance=parnasse.ru }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Уже сейчас возникает представление о полицейском строе и о государстве как об органе правопорядка. Но если и эти структуры государства разлагаются под ударами денег? |Example.Gloss=Already now arises understanding of police and government as law-enforcement institutions. But if these government structures are decomposing under the blow of money? |Example.English translation=Nowadays there arises an understanding of police and government as law-enforcement institutions.But what if these governmetn struvtures are decomposing under the impact of money? |Example.Provenance=psiholog.mirtesen.ru/blog/43121056091/Poslednyaya-funktsiya-gosudarstva }} |Entered by=Inna, |Last reviewed by=Kristina |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=GOVERNMENT IS A PLANT |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias}} |Family=Social Metaphors, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Растение |Target frame=Власть |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=PEOPLE ARE PLANTS }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Официальная Россия, включая все органы, институты, участки, отделения, комитеты и министерства, — это продукт разложения советской государственной системы. Единственный процесс, который полным ходом идет в российском государстве (не в обществе, не в стране, а именно в структурах государства), — это разложение. Гниение системы началось до формального конца СССР и продолжается на наших глазах.. Мы каждый день получаем новую порцию продуктов распада: новое преступление людей в погонах, новый приговор купленного суда. |Example.English translation=Official Russia, including its authorities, institutions, police stations, departments, committees and ministries, is a product of decomposition of the Soviet national system.The only process, which is well under way in the Russian state (neither in the society,nor in the country, but in governmental structures) is decomposition. The rot of the system started long before the formal collapse of the USSR and is going before our eyes. We get a serving of breakdown product every day: a new crime of people in uniform, a new sentence of the corrupt court. |Example.Provenance=www.vedomosti.ru/opinion/news/1538709/fundament_novoj_respubliki }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=В конце концов, такие пирамидальные системы (государства, корпорации, церкви) загнивают и разрушаются, |Example.Gloss=In the end of ends, such pyramidal systems (governments, corporations, churches)are becoming rotten and extinct. |Example.English translation=After all, such pyramidal systems (governments, corporations, churches)are becoming rotten and extinct. |Example.Provenance=parnasse.ru }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Уже сейчас возникает представление о полицейском строе и о государстве как об органе правопорядка. Но если и эти структуры государства разлагаются под ударами денег? |Example.Gloss=Already now arises understanding of police and government as law-enforcement institutions. But if these government structures are decomposing under the blow of money? |Example.English translation=Nowadays there arises an understanding of police and government as law-enforcement institutions.But what if these governmetn struvtures are decomposing under the impact of money? |Example.Provenance=psiholog.mirtesen.ru/blog/43121056091/Poslednyaya-funktsiya-gosudarstva }} |Entered by=Inna, |Last reviewed by=Kristina |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

Единственный процесс, который полным ходом идет в российском государстве (не в обществе, не в стране, а именно в структурах государства), — это разложение. Гниение системы началось до формального конца СССР и продолжается на наших глазах.. Мы каждый день получаем новую порцию продуктов распада: новое преступление людей в погонах, новый приговор купленного суда. |Example.English translation=Official Russia, including its authorities, institutions, police stations, departments, committees and ministries, is a product of decomposition of the Soviet national system.The only process, which is well under way in the Russian state (neither in the society,nor in the country, but in governmental structures) is decomposition. The rot of the system started long before the formal collapse of the USSR and is going before our eyes. We get a serving of breakdown product every day: a new crime of people in uniform, a new sentence of the corrupt court. |Example.Provenance=www.vedomosti.ru/opinion/news/1538709/fundament_novoj_respubliki }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=В конце концов, такие пирамидальные системы (государства, корпорации, церкви) загнивают и разрушаются, |Example.Gloss=In the_end of_ends, such pyramidal systems (governments, corporations, churches)are_becoming_rotten and extinct. |Example.English translation=After all, such pyramidal systems (governments, corporations, churches)are becoming rotten and extinct. |Example.Provenance=parnasse.ru }}{{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text=Уже сейчас возникает представление о полицейском строе и о государстве как об органе правопорядка. Но если и эти структуры государства разлагаются под ударами денег? |Example.Gloss=Already now arises understanding of police and government as law-enforcement institutions. But if these government structures are decomposing under the blow of money? |Example.English translation=Nowadays there arises an understanding of police and government as law-enforcement institutions.But what if these governmetn struvtures are decomposing under the impact of money? |Example.Provenance=psiholog.mirtesen.ru/blog/43121056091/Poslednyaya-funktsiya-gosudarstva }} |Entered by=Kristina, Inna, |Last reviewed by=Kristina |Status=in development |Investigated for=Russian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=GOVERNMENT - IS A_POLICEMAN |Aliases= |Family=Метафоры правительственных функций, Метафоры управления, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source frame=Полиция |Target frame=Правительство |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a source subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=ПРАВИТЕЛЬСТВО - ЭТО ОСОБА }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Russian |Example.Text= В цивилизованном обществе запрещено использование силы в человеческих отношениях; в нем правительство, как полицейский, может использовать силу только для ответного удара и только против тех, кто использовал силу первым. |Example.Gloss=In civilized society is_forbidden use of_force in human affairs, in it government, as police_officer may use force only for retaliatory strike and only against those, who used force first. |Example.English translation=In a civilized society it is forbidden to use force in human affairs; in such societies it is the government, which, as a police officer, may use force only for retaliation and only against those who started to use the force. |Example.Provenance=http://marsexxx.com/ycnex/rand-morality_of_individualism.htm }} |Entered by=Kristina, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=GOVERNMENT IS A POLICEMAN |Investigated for=Russian }}
